name: HCTP: Gnome-like caption area (FX 56-)
description: Removes the minimize and maximize buttons for Hide Caption Toolbar Plus, centers close button on maximized windows.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info: Does not style the close button itself, so I recommend using the Windows 10 caption buttons for closest style. It seems like something HCTP does seems to break it, as a temporary fix just disable and enable the style.
